name: Unlight:SchizoChronicle
description: "Unlight:SchizoChronicle" is a real time deck building game. Every turn each player purchases cards and fights against monsters. If you purchase a card, if that card gets added to your deck and you win the battle with the monster you get a "sherd point".
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7,Windows8,Windows10 Processor: Core i3 2130 Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
